interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2019/07/31
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Andy De Emmony', 'Sarah Harding', 'Jamie Payne'], 'Producers': ['Jake Lushington', 'Trevor Hopkins', 'Matthew Patnick', 'Greg Phillips', 'Geoff Webb', 'Christine Healy', 'Simon Heath']}
Review Text: Absolutely brilliant! I love these women working together with their respective super powers. Its beautifully done and really a joy to watch. Its lovely to see strong female leads is such a compelling story. Season 1 is a bit scary - so be warned. That being said. -the acting, cinematography, and costume design are perfection. Enjoy!
Review Title: Outstanding - We need more of this show!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sidekicks: A Dreamer and a Champion VHS Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges (Actor) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Run time': '1 hour and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 9, 2000', 'Date First Available': 'February 24, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges'} OK - so you have an ADHD kid who zones out into day dreams about Chuck Norris!

What could be better?

As hilarious as I remembered it to be.

The real question is why hasn't this cult classic come out on DVD? Phenomenal.... I mean - come on?! {'Content advisory': ['Foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Theodore Melfi'], 'Producers': ['Donna Gigliotti', 'Peter Chernin', 'Jenno Topping', 'Pharrell Williams', 'Theodore Melfi'], 'Starring': ['Taraji P. Henson', 'Janelle Monae', 'Kevin Costner']} This movie rocks.... from start to finish!!
Girl Power at its best.
... and who knew how gorgeous Janelle Monae is and how she holds the screen. Girl Power at its best.. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Kelly'], 'Starring': ['Caitríona Balfe', 'Sam Heughan', 'Gary Lewis'], 'Studio': ['starz_svod']} Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT.

Such an interesting story. Why ruin it with such horror?

I just dont need those images in my brain. Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT. Such an interesting ... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español', 'Português', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Français', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Tom Austen', 'Elizabeth Hurley'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track. Liz Hurley kills it and excellent casting all the way - including the Aussie actress who plays the princess. Her accent from down under peaks through from time to time - but she's so fun to watch.
Warning - addictive and binge worthy. Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Producers': ['Mark Schwahn', 'Brian Robbins', 'Joe Davola', 'Shuana Phelan'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Vincent Regan', 'Merritt Patterson']} The most entertaining, hilarious, eye-candy that will pull you in from the first moment. Hurley delivers an unexpected twist on the notion of the queen. Excellent casting all around. Excellent casting all around {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Steven Conrad'], 'Producers': ['Glenn Ficarra', 'John Requa', 'Jennifer Scher', 'Charles Gogolak', 'Christina Fitzgerald', 'Bruce Terris', 'Michael Nelson', 'Peter Moxley', 'James Parriott', 'Gil Bellows', 'Stephen Hoey'], 'Starring': ['Chris Conrad', 'Kurtwood Smith', 'Michael Dorman'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} How is it that I just heard about this show? Its everything I want.
Its beautiful music, directing, and acting. All of the actors are perfection.
Its hard to describe - but its a Must watch. As someone who votes - I'm surprised it hasn't gotten more awards.
It doesn't have to rely on anything grotesque or sexually subversive to achieve its humor.
Dark comedy at its best. Spectacular in Every Way! {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Andy De Emmony', 'Sarah Harding', 'Jamie Payne'], 'Producers': ['Jake Lushington', 'Trevor Hopkins', 'Matthew Patnick', 'Greg Phillips', 'Geoff Webb', 'Christine Healy', 'Simon Heath']} Absolutely brilliant! I love these women working together with their respective super powers. Its beautifully done and really a joy to watch. Its lovely to see strong female leads is such a compelling story. Season 1 is a bit scary - so be warned. That being said. -the acting, cinematography, and costume design are perfection. Enjoy! Outstanding - We need more of this show!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Enthusiast:** The user maintains a strong passion for movies and TV shows, especially those with cult status and unique storytelling elements. They appreciate contemporary works that resonate with powerful themes while becoming increasingly sensitive to graphic content that detracts from narrative quality.

- **Nostalgia Driven:** Values content that evokes nostalgia, favoring classics from the late '90s and early 2000s. They particularly enjoy nostalgic formats like VHS and seek out shows that celebrate strong female leads and compelling narratives.

- **Comedy and Empowerment Appreciation:** Enjoys humorous content, particularly dark comedies that blend humor with themes of empowerment and representation, showing a discerning taste for storytelling quality. Their recent review highlights a preference for shows that deliver humor without grotesque or sexually subversive elements.

- **Family Considerations:** Reflects on media from a child’s viewpoint, prioritizing family-friendly content suitable for younger audiences.

- **Frustration with Discontinuation:** Concerned about access to older media formats and expressing a desire for easier access to nostalgic classics.

- **Critical Engagement:** Values captivating storytelling, strong casting, and engaging soundtracks, demonstrated by high ratings for content that avoids sensationalism. They recently praised a show for its strong female characters, excellent acting, and stunning cinematography, reaffirming their preference for quality and depth in media.

Overall, the user leans toward nostalgic, family-oriented, and comedic films featuring memorable characters and important social themes while being selective about content lacking substance.
